Hextech Affinity.name: Hextech Affinity
Hextech Affinity.blurb: Gain Movement Speed while near allied towers and turrets deployed by Heimerdinger.
Hextech Affinity.description: Innate: Heimerdinger gains  20% bonus movement speed while near allied turrets or his   own.

H-28G Evolution Turret.name: H-28G Evolution Turret
H-28G Evolution Turret.blurb: Heimerdinger lays down a rapid-fire cannon turret equipped with a secondary pass-through beam attack (turrets deal half damage to towers).
H-28G Evolution Turret.description: Passive: Heimerdinger periodically stocks a Turret Kit, up to a maximum of 3.
H-28G Evolution Turret.description2: Active: Heimerdinger deploys a H-28G Evolution Turret at the target location.
H-28G Evolution Turret.description3: Up to 3 H-28G Evolution Turrets can be deployed at a time, and deploying a fourth destroys the oldest one.
H-28G Evolution Turret.description4: See pets section for further information on turrets.
H-28G Evolution Turret.notes:
* Leveling or ranking up H-28G Evolution Turret will not affect the stats of turrets created beforehand.
 Turret Kit stockpile is displayed by a buff, represented as small metal nuts orbiting Heimerdinger
 The Turret Kit buff will visually represent the recharge rate cooldown, and how many H-28G Evolution Turrets that Heimerdinger has stored, Allowing ally and foe to see this information.
 The recharge rate of H-28G Evolution Turret is affected by  Cooldown Reduction.

H-28Q Apex Turret.name: H-28Q Apex Turret
H-28Q Apex Turret.description: UPGRADE!!! - Active: Heimerdinger deploys a H-28Q Apex Turret at the target location, which lasts for 8 seconds.
H-28Q Apex Turret.description2: H-28Q Apex Turret scales with  UPGRADE!!!'s rank.

Hextech Micro-Rockets.name: Hextech Micro-Rockets
Hextech Micro-Rockets.blurb: Heimerdinger fires long-range rockets that converge on his cursor.
Hextech Micro-Rockets.description: Active: Heimerdinger unleashes a wave of 5 rockets that converge to the target location and fan beyond it up to a maximum range, with each rocket dealing  magic damage to the first enemy it hits. Every rocket hitting an enemy  champion grants 20% beam charge to all turrets within 1000 range, up to a maximum of 100% beam charge when hitting 5 rockets on an enemy champion.
Hextech Micro-Rockets.description2: Enemies can be hit by multiple rockets, with each one beyond the first dealing reduced damage.
Hextech Micro-Rockets.leveling2:
Additional Damage:
10 / 16 / 22 / 28 / 34 (+ 12% AP)
Total Damage:
90 / 144 / 198 / 252 / 306 (+ 93% AP)
Additional Minion Damage:
30 / 48 / 66 / 84 / 102 (+ 35.75% AP)
Total Minion Damage:
170 / 272 / 374 / 476 / 578 (+ 188% AP)
Hextech Micro-Rockets.notes: * Aiming Hextech Micro-Rockets is done in the same fashion as  Glitterlance, allowing for custom spread.

Hextech Rocket Swarm.name: Hextech Rocket Swarm
Hextech Rocket Swarm.description: UPGRADE!!! - Active: Heimerdinger launches 4 waves of rockets in quick succession, each rocket dealing magic damage.  Champions and  monsters are dealt reduced damage from rockets beyond the first, and further reduced beyond the fifth.
Hextech Rocket Swarm.leveling:
Initial Rocket Magic Damage:
135 / 180 / 225 (+ 45% AP)
2-5 Rocket Magic Damage:
32 / 45 / 58 (+ 12% AP)
6-20 Rocket Magic Damage:
16 / 22.5 / 29 (+ 6% AP)
Total Magic Damage:
503 / 697.5 / 892 (+ 183% AP)
Total Minion Magic Damage:
2700 / 3600 / 4500 (+ 900% AP)
Hextech Rocket Swarm.description2: Hextech Rocket Swarm scales with  UPGRADE!!!'s rank.
Hextech Rocket Swarm.notes:
* Aiming Hextech Rocket Swarm is done in the same fashion as  Glitterlance, allowing for custom spread.
 Heimerdinger can move once Hextech Rocket Swarm has been cast, even if the projectiles are still spawning or haven't even started to move yet.

CH-2 Electron Storm Grenade.name: CH-2 Electron Storm Grenade
CH-2 Electron Storm Grenade.blurb: Heimerdinger lobs a grenade at a location, dealing damage to enemy units, as well as stunning anyone directly hit and slowing surrounding units.
CH-2 Electron Storm Grenade.description: Active: Heimerdinger hurls a grenade at the target location, dealing magic damage upon impact to all nearby enemies and  slowing them by 35% for 2 seconds. If the grenade hits an enemy  champion, all turrets within 1000 range of the impact gain 100% beam charge.
CH-2 Electron Storm Grenade.description2: Enemies at the center of the grenade's impact are also  stunned for 1.5 seconds.

CH-3X Lightning Grenade.name: CH-3X Lightning Grenade
CH-3X Lightning Grenade.description: UPGRADE!!! - Active: Heimerdinger hurls a massive grenade at the target location that bounces a fixed distance 3 times, exploding each time at twice the radius.
CH-3X Lightning Grenade.description2: Enemy champions can only be damaged once per cast, but can be  slowed and  stunned multiple times if circumstances permit.
CH-3X Lightning Grenade.description3: CH-3X Lightning Grenade scales with  UPGRADE!!!'s rank.

UPGRADE!!!.name: UPGRADE!!!
UPGRADE!!!.blurb: Heimerdinger invents an upgrade, causing his next spell to have increased effects.
UPGRADE!!!.description: Active: Heimerdinger empowers his next basic ability, placing it on the same  cooldown as its basic form, modifying its damage and making it free to cast.
UPGRADE!!!.description2: After Heimerdinger has had UPGRADE!!! active for 3 seconds without using another ability, he can reactivate it to cancel the empowerment and put it on a 3-second cooldown. UPGRADE!!! only goes on its normal cooldown if Heimerdinger uses an empowered ability.
UPGRADE!!!.notes: * UPGRADE!!! can be cast while Heimerdinger is  disabled.
